main_definition: in accordance with the law or regulations; permitted by law.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Complying with laws and legal requirements.
meanings_and_examples.example: She opened her own business legally, ensuring she had all necessary licenses.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Performing an action that is sanctioned by law or statute.
meanings_and_examples.example: He acted legally when he paid the taxes on his property before selling it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to legal matters and principles in a court of law.
meanings_and_examples.example: The discussion at the hearing was strictly based on legal facts and arguments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Authorized by law or sanctioned through legal means.
meanings_and_examples.example: They obtained permission legally for their construction project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In accordance with the statutes, regulations, and ordinances that govern an activity or action.
meanings_and_examples.example: She made her will legally by following all legal procedures.
